definition: Associated Press (AP)/abbr. to 美聯社|美联社[Mei3 Lian2 she4]

Mei3 guo2 Wu3 shi2 yi1 Qu1

definition: abbr. for 美國證券交易委員會|美国证券交易委员会, US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC)

sentences.english: EarthSound's products have an excellent track record in the States.
sentences.chinese: 天籁的产品在美国有非常辉煌的过去。

sentences.english: The United States has been the world’s breadbasket for more than half a century.
sentences.chinese: 过去的半个世纪内，美国一直是世界的面包篮子。

sentences.english: And the Volt is made in America while the Prius comes from Japan.
sentences.chinese: 此外，Volt是美国制造，而普锐斯来自日本。

sentences.english: I was a Teacher for America Corp member and I now work for TFA.
sentences.chinese: 我是为美国而教的成员，现在为组织工作。

sentences.english: In terms of overall child protection, the United States is certainly in the top echelon.
sentences.chinese: 从保护儿童的总体情况来看，美国肯定名列前茅。

sentences.english: Slavery was abolished in the United States after the Civil War.
sentences.chinese: 美国的奴隶制度自南北战争后就废除了。

sentences.english: The best of America's skaters beamed for the camera.
sentences.chinese: 最佳美国的溜冰者为照相机放光了。

sentences.english: Americans continue to debate how to interpret the Second Amendment.
sentences.chinese: 美国人为如何解释第二修正案继续辩论。

sentences.english: The slavery was overthrown after the Civil War in U.S.A.
sentences.chinese: 在南北战争结束之后，美国的奴隶制被废除了。

sentences.english: China was second with 32, four behind the United States.
sentences.chinese: 中国有32枚，比美国少4枚，排在第二位。

sentences.english: Time Warner is parent company of AOL.
sentences.chinese: 时代华纳是美国在线的母公司。

sentences.english: Staggering tasks confronted the people of the United States , North and South , when the Civil War ended.
sentences.chinese: 内战结束后，美国南北方的人民都面临着艰巨的任务。

sentences.english: S. senator. In Congress, Johnson was a strong advocate of America's westward expansion.
sentences.chinese: 在国会里，强森大力支持美国向西部扩张的计画。

sentences.english: And the NMD program is, in essence, an U.S. program of unilateral nuclear expansion, which harbors the inherent danger of triggering an arms race at a higher level.
sentences.chinese: 美国此举显然孕育着引发更高水平上军备竞赛的危险。

sentences.english: It surely ranks among the most valuable literary artifacts in America.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，它算得上美国最珍贵的文学遗产之一。

sentences.english: AMERICA'S political priorities have undergone a breathtaking about-turn.
sentences.chinese: 美国政治上优先考虑的事情已然经历了一个大转变。

definition: United Kingdom 聯合王國|联合王国[Lian2 he2 wang2 guo2]/United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland/abbr. for England 英格蘭|英格兰[Ying1 ge2 lan2]
(coll.) an American/person from the United States
Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-
United States/name of a country that formerly existed near Samarkand
